channel.title: Adding a new loginbox
channel.description: I know how to add a new one, like using Tom's Cache Editor. But what I want to do is add a custom one, like does anyone know a tutorial for this? Learning the code for it and stuff. Well thanks!

item.title: Adding a new loginbox
item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

Lol common sense, change the login box via cache editing then you have to edit the sizes in client.java + edit few other things.

Read full topic
